scripts.build-nodejs-server: cd ../nodejs-server && npm run build && cd ../build && webpack
scripts.copy-nodejs-server: cd ..  && copyfiles -u 3 nodejs-server/node_modules/leveldown/prebuilds/**/* build/dist/ && copyfiles --flat nodejs-server/config.json build/dist
scripts.build-react-nodejs: npm run clean && npm run build-react-client && npm run build-nodejs-server && npm run copy-react-client && npm run copy-nodejs-server && npm run copy-package
